question: In which city the First water ATM was inaugurated?
explanation: Telangana State Home Minister Naini Narasimha Reddy has inaugurated 'Any Time Water' kiosk, known as water ATM near Nalgonda X Roads which is joint initiative of Safe Water Network, an international NGO and Greater Hyderabad Municipal Corporation (GHMC). Purified water will be made available at a payment of 2 per litre and 20 per 20 litres of water. A total of 200 ATMs will be set up to reach a targetted 150,000 people. In the first phase 50 water ATMs will be operationalised by 2018.
